peti7788,"2022-01-30T17:50:40.657Z","Much better than the previous version","

4 years ago, I bought the predecessor of this set, the 60177 Airshow Jet set.
column2: Because I love airplanes and this set was even cheaper than its predecessor, I bought it right away. At the time, I had no idea it was much better than the previous version.
s start the story a little older and go back to 1999.&nbsp
column3: I think the back wings of this plane are from the Red Tiger plane.

column1: And here the rear wings were finally printed instead of the stickers.
column2: The engine is also much more ingenious if you spin the wheel, the flame piece is really like if the afterburner were working.&nbsp
column3: The nose and wings of the plane are also cleaner.&nbsp
column4: The wings here are at least larger and consist of only 1 part.&nbsp
column5: <strong>So the designer did a very good job! It&rsquo
column6: s hard to make a good toy&nbsp
column7: out of so few parts, especially at the entry level.

column2: Since this is a starter set, unfortunately there is no oxygen mask for the helmet. But it doesn&#39

column1: The whole set consists of far fewer parts than its predecessor, yet is much more imaginative, beautiful and usable. I absolutely recommend it, so you have to buy it for the price!
I just wanted to change what makes the plane simpler and cheaper, yet more beautiful.
column2: This only applies to the cockpit and landing gear.

column1: I disappeared for the ugly 2x8 gray plate, put a 2x2 brick in its place, and replaced the rear wheels with smaller ones to match the size of the front wheel. So it'

column3: />I put a seat in the cockpit.&nbsp
column4: For this, I changed the 2x3 slope brick to 2x2. There are also 2 options for the HUD.&nbsp
column5: It is easier if there are 2 pieces of green 2x3 bricks. And not green, it&#39

column1: This leaves room for two 1x2 jumped pieces. One for the joystick, the other for the HUD.
The other solution is nicer, I like it better. Instead of a 2x3 brick, I used a 1x2 jumper plate. More realistic.
